amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on National Defense Appropriations Act Fiscal Year 2006.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2501 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12594) To express the sense of the Senate on National Defense Appropriations Act Fiscal Year 2006.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2501 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2501 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Nelson FL.
